## Toast.show() method

Shows a toast notification.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static show(workspace: WorkspaceSvg, options: ToastOptions): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | The workspace to show the toast on. |
|  options | [ToastOptions](./blockly.toastoptions_interface.md) | Configuration options for the toast message, duration, etc. |

**Returns:**

void
